name: SPIDER SURGE
description:
A fanmade Spider-Man PC game (inspired by Marvel's Spider-Man PS4). This content is not affiliated with Marvel Studios, respective credits have been given in-game. 

CONTROLS

Walk - WASD

Run - Shift + (W/A/S/D)

Jump - Space

I - Open Suit Inventory/Close Suit Inventory.

CREDITS

Game inspired by Marvel's Spider-Man PS4 and Tyler Green 

(Check him out here: https://www.youtube.com/c/TylerGreen/)

The prologue trailer - 


2 Songs (Spider-Man by John Paesano and The Golden Age by John Paesano)
